title: 820-00291 iMac Chime Repeat.
message:
Hi,

This is 2015 27 inch iMac. 
Chime repeat.
Tried with new bios, New rams, new Cmos battery , same chime repeat.

Could this be GPU?
Really appreciate your help.

title: 820-00291 iMac Chime Repeat.
message:
Still the same if disconnect power button?
Also test the board alone on the desk, nothing connected; keep only test speaker.
